Name: POST-EVA
checklistText:
POST EVA
Close the hatch using the [C] menu.

On the overhead panel:
- Ensure CABIN VENT ring handle is in Normal position

Set the ECS CRYO meter to O2

In the center pedestal panel:
- Rotate the red REPRESS knob to OPEN

Wait until the CABIN PRESSURE gauge reaches normal cabin conditions.

In the center pedestal panel:
- Rotate the red REPRESS knob to CLOSED

Check your CRYO oxygen level.
